title: AI education for clinicians

abstract: Rapid advancements in medical AI necessitate targeted educational initiatives for clinicians to ensure AI tools are safe and used effectively to improve patient outcomes. To support decision-making among stakeholders in medical education …

title: Effective Global Context Integration for Lightweight 3D Medical Image Segmentation
details: Q Qiao, M Qu, W Wang, B Jiang, Q Guo - IEEE Transactions on Circuits and Systems …, 2024
abstract: Accurate and fast segmentation of 3D medical images is crucial in clinical analysis. CNNs struggle to capture long-range dependencies because of their inductive biases, whereas the Transformer can capture global features but faces a …
